statements: SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE development_stage = 'vegetative';
SELECT crop_name, development_stage FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE growth_stage = 'ripening';
SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, development_stage FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering' ORDER BY development_stage ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE crop_name = 'Corn'
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE development_stage = 'vegetative' ORDER BY growth_stage ASC
SELECT * FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE development_stage IN ('ripening', 'vegetative')
SELECT crop_name, development_stage FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering' AND crop_name LIKE '%bean%'
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE development_stage = 'germination' OR development_stage = 'seedling'
SELECT * FROM CropDevelopmentStages;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM CropDevelopmentStages WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering';
SELECT id, crop_name, growth_stage FROM CropDevelopmentStages ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropDevelopmentStages WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, crop_name, growth_stage, description FROM CropDevelopmentStages WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CropDevelopmentStages WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM CropDevelopmentStages ORDER BY growth_stage DESC;
SELECT crop_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM CropDevelopmentStages GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM CropGrowthData WHERE growth_height > 10 ORDER BY growth_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage, description FROM CropDevelopmentStages WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering';
SELECT * FROM gm_crops;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM gm_crops ORDER BY growth_stage DESC;
SELECT crop_name, stage_name FROM gm_crops LEFT JOIN crop_per_stage ON gm_crops.crop_id = crop_per_stage.crop_id LEFT JOIN growth_stages ON crop_per_stage.stage_id = growth_stages.stage_id;
SELECT crop_name, modified_gene FROM gm_crops WHERE modified_gene IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM growth_stages WHERE stage_name='Seedling';
SELECT * FROM gm_crops;
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM gm_crops WHERE growth_stage > 3;
SELECT crop_name, stage_name FROM gm_crops JOIN crop_per_stage ON gm_crops.crop_id = crop_per_stage.crop_id JOIN growth_stages ON crop_per_stage.stage_id = growth_stages.stage_id;
SELECT crop_name FROM gm_crops WHERE modified_gene = 'BT';
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM gm_crops ORDER BY growth_stage DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_name = 'Carrot';
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM crop WHERE crop_id = 5;
SELECT stage_name, duration FROM growth_stage WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM development_stage WHERE description LIKE '%flowering%';

SELECT m.mapping_id, c.crop_name, g.stage_name, d.description FROM crop_stage_mapping m JOIN crop c ON m.crop_id = c.crop_id JOIN growth_stage g ON m.growth_stage_id = g.growth_stage_id JOIN development_stage d ON m.development_stage_id = d.dev_stage_id WHERE c.crop_id = 3;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crop WHERE growth_stage='Germination';
SELECT * FROM growth_stage WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY duration DESC;

SELECT c.crop_name, g.stage_name, d.description FROM crop c JOIN crop_stage_mapping m ON c.crop_id = m.crop_id JOIN growth_stage g ON m.growth_stage_id = g.growth_stage_id JOIN development_stage d ON m.development_stage_id = d.dev_stage_id;

SELECT c.crop_name, g.stage_name, d.stage_name FROM crop c JOIN crop_stage_mapping m ON c.crop_id = m.crop_id JOIN growth_stage g ON m.growth_stage_id = g.growth_stage_id JOIN development_stage d ON m.development_stage_id = d.dev_stage_id WHERE g.duration < 20;

SELECT c.crop_name, g.stage_name, d.description FROM crop c JOIN crop_stage_mapping m ON c.crop_id = m.crop_id JOIN growth_stage g ON m.growth_stage_id = g.growth_stage_id JOIN development_stage d ON m.development_stage_id = d.dev_stage_id WHERE c.crop_name LIKE 'Potato';
SELECT * FROM Crop_Species;
SELECT id, species_name FROM Crop_Species WHERE growth_stage = 'Seedling';
SELECT species_name, growth_stage FROM Crop_Species ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT crop_id, growth_stage, growth_date FROM Growth_Stage_Log WHERE growth_stage = 'Flowering' ORDER BY growth_date ASC;
SELECT id, height_cm, leaf_width_cm FROM Plant_Measurements WHERE height_cm > 50 AND leaf_width_cm < 5;
SELECT * FROM Crop_Species LIMIT 5;
SELECT species_name, growth_stage FROM Crop_Species WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT species_name, growth_stage FROM Crop_Species ORDER BY species_name ASC, growth_stage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Growth_Stage_Log WHERE growth_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_id, AVG(height_cm), MAX(leaf_width_cm) FROM Plant_Measurements GROUP BY crop_id;
